messages.content: Roll number 5 ka fee status kya hai?
Zaid Ali ke liye Term 1 Pending hai. Inki total pending fees ₹2,500 hai.
Zaid Ali ka guardian kaun hai aur contact kya hai?
Guardian ka naam Mr. Gupta hai, phone number 9823217781. Zaid Ali Class 9A mein padhte hain.
Springfield Public School ka principal kaun hai?
Principal ka naam Mr. Sharma hai. Unka email principal.sps@example.com hai.
Roll number 77 ka fee status kya hai?
Simran Kaur ke liye Term 3 Pending hai. Inki total pending fees ₹3,000 hai.
Simran Kaur ka guardian kaun hai aur contact kya hai?
Guardian ka naam Mr. Gupta hai, phone number 9874192527. Simran Kaur Class 10B mein padhti hain.
Kon se students fail hue hain Term 1 mein?
Term 1 mein Roll number 5 (Zaid Ali), Roll number 22 (Rohan Sharma), aur Roll number 64 (Aman Verma) fail hue hain.
Roll number 60 ka fee status kya hai?
Neha Gupta ke liye Term 1 Pending hai. Inki total pending fees ₹1,800 hai.

Guardian ka naam Mr. Gupta hai, phone number 9861307201. Neha Gupta Class 8C mein padhti hain.
Ms. Neha Gupta kya padhati hain?
Ms. Neha Gupta Mathematics subject padhati hain. Woh Class 6-10 ko padhati hain.
Total kitne students ke fees pending hain?
Abhi tak 35 students ki fees pending hai, jinka total amount ₹87,500 hai.

Term 2 mein Roll number 33 (Ayesha Khan), Roll number 47 (Neha Gupta), aur Roll number 71 (Zaid Ali) fail hue hain.

Mr. Adil Khan kya padhati hain?
Mr. Adil Khan History subject padhati hain. Woh Class 8-12 ko padhati hain.

School mein total 28 teachers hain, jismein 15 male aur 13 female teachers hain.
